statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 4 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 7 \\ -7 \\ -11 \\ -25 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
